title: Spagheti carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese,bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chili powder, and salt for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
Heat butter in a pan, add tomato puree and garam masala, cook for 10 minutes.
Add cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add cooked chicken to the gravy and mix well.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, olive oil, lemon juice, and seasoning.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, chili flakes
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado in a bowl, add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
